version_description:
1. Warship Haruna has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types, 1 Cash Type)

2. New episode 38 has been added. (7 Missions)

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. Limited Submarine i400 has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types)

2. Standard Warship Spruance (USA) has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remolded Types, 1 Cash Type)

3. New Submarine Feature has been added.
- When Submarine goes underwater, a Fighter seeks and attacks near enemies until mission ends.
- Only certain Submarines have this feature (Submarine i400 included).

4. New Episode 39, 40 has been added.

5. Premium Shop's UI has been revamped.

6. Enemies' Pattern in Time Attack has been changed.

7. Battle Arena's general balance and Matching System has been changed.

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. Limited Warship Oliver Hazard has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types)

2. New Episode 41 has been added. (7 Missions)

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. Standard Warship Kitty-Hawk has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types, 1 Cash Type)
2. New episode 42 has been added. (7 missions)

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. Limited Warship Kiev has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types)

2. New Episode 43 has been added . (7 Missions)

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. Episodes have been renewed. (New chapters, boss battles, Hell and Hard difficulties have been added)

2. Balance changes have been made. (Adjusted rewards, difficulty of Boss Attack and rewards of Time Attack)

3. Support helicopters have been added.

4. New events have started. (Random Gift Box and double exp for Warships completing Hidden Missions, more rewards for completing Time Attack, double rewards for completing Daily Quest)

5. 50% discount event has started. (50% off on Officer hiring prices, Warship and Admiral Skill upgrade costs, Museum expansion cost)

6. Special Package has been added. (available only during 6/28-7/20 PDT)

7. Facebook coupon event has started.

8. Login Reward has been added.

9. New Warship Almirante Grau has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Type, 1 Cash Type)

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. New limited Warship AMAGI has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types)

2. New episode 44 'Iran 's Counterattack (1980)' has been added.

3. Improved rewards for clearing Boss Attack.

4. Lowered Boss Attack's difficulty.

5. Improved Support Helicopter's AI.

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. New standard Warship HMAS Vampire has been added. (1 Basic type, 2 Remodeled types, 1 Cash type)

2. New episode 45 "Air Invasion of Iran(1980)" has been added.

3. 2nd Year Anniversery event (50% off, double rewards and others) has ended.

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

1. New limited Warship KRIVAK-class Frigate has been added. (1 Basic Type, 2 Remodeled Types)

2. New episode 46 "Strike Package (1980)" has been added.

3. Summer Event has started.
- Get event items when you destroy ships in Hidden Mission
- Event item(s) grant you Gold and Dollar

4. Bugs have been fixed.

Have any feedbacks?
Leave a review or contact our customer support(support@joycity.com) for any inquiries.

3. Summer events have ended.

1. New Warship NANUCHKA has been added.

2. New episode 53 "Operation Sutton (1981)" has been added.

# Season 4 Update

1. New Cruiser BELKNAP has been added. (1 Basic, 2 Remodeled, 1 Cash)

2. New Boss Attack "13, 14, 15" has been added.

3. Now able to perform up to 6 missions at the same time.

4. Revamped in-game UI.

# Season 4 Update

1. New Warship Hatakaze has been added. (1 Basic, 2 Remodeled, 1 Cash)

2. Boss Attack difficulty adjusted.

3. Hidden Mission Event has ended.

1. New Limited Warship Seawolf has been added. (1 Cash, 2 remodeled)

2. A new episode has been added.

1. New Carrier Admiral Kuznetsov has been added. (1 Cash, 2 Remodeled)

2. Lunar New Year Event has been added. Play hidden missions and get present boxes at a certain chance. Gold/Dollar/Item are obtainable from the boxes.
1. New Warship HMS SHEFFIELD has been added. (1 Cash, 2 Remodeled)

1. New Carrier Admiral Kuznetsov has been added. (1 Cash, 2 Remodeled)

2. Lunar New Year Event has been added. Play hidden missions and get present boxes at a certain chance. Gold/Dollar/Item are obtainable from the boxes.

1. Lupo has been added as a regular ship. (1 Basic, 2 Remodeled, 1 Cash)

2. Beginner package has been revamped.

3. Attendance reward has been improved.

1. Limited Warship WARSPITE has been added. (2 Remodeled, 1 Cash)

2. Hidden Mission Event has ended.

3. Hiddem Mission Difficulty Level Hell has been adjusted.

1. Alfa has been added as a regular ship.
